paragraph.paragraph: The Build Events property page in the Configuration Properties folder contains the following properties:

Pre-build Event Command Line
The command-line commands to execute prior to a build being performed on an EiffelEnvision project.

Clicking on the ellipse (...) button will display the edit_command_dialog.xmlEdit Post-build Event dialog where you can enter a number of commands to execute as if they were in a DOS batch (*.bat) file.

Post-build Event Command Line
The command-line commands to execute after a build has been performed on an EiffelEnvision project.
Note: The post-build event will only be executed based on the condition met by the Run the Post-build Event? property.

Clicking on the ellipse (...) button will display the edit_command_dialog.xmlEdit Post-build Event dialog where you can enter a number of commands to execute as if they were in a DOS batch (*.bat) file.

Run the Post-build Event?
Determins when to run the pos-build event specified in Post-build Event Command Line
